column2:
"It's been a while <%me>.
I apologize for causing you trouble last time."
"Thanks to you, I wasn't shocked when I found a part of myself that I didn't realize existed."
"I've finally got the courage to move forward, even if everything still seems strange to me."
"I won't use my sister's name anymore. This is the end of Melphonsina."
"From now on, I'm Melrondia. I'm moving forward with my name."
"That Dark Falz- I mean, Sir Gettemhart- said so."
"My powers are still lacking, but if you need help, please feel free to call on me any time."
